title: Executive in pres. systems electoral independence

content.prompt: One difference between the parliamentary and presidential forms of government is that the presidential form

choices.label: ensures there will be no periods of divided government

makes the executive subject to a possible vote of no confidence by the legislature

makes the executive electorally independent of other branches of government
